ActiveJDBC & ActiveWeb for Java w/Igor Polevoy

Description: Working in Java and want the hotness of Ruby on Rails? Igor Polevoy will show how to make your Java life easier and more Rails-ey using ActiveJDBC and ActiveWeb. ActiveJDBC is an implementation of ActiveRecord in Java, and ActiveWeb is a full stack web application framework in Java, both inspired by Ruby on Rails. Learn how to increase productivity in Java as well as improve code quality with true TDD/BDD.
Duration: 115 min · Published: Mar 21, 2012
Watch on Vimeo
